divs: sighting detailsmy son daniel saw this object from upstairs and run down to the kitchen were i was having my tea and cleaning my camera. daniel told me about a bright object in the sky just after dusk, he have seen similar strange things before so we the three of us including my wife step outside and i started to video this thing that i saw look like a star but as i got closer my eyes refuse to see what i was witnessing. the first shots i took on march 30\03\2011 at 19:23:38. the other shots i took on the same next day on march 31\03\2011 at 19:09:54. i took two more shots after this making three shots all together. the reason for that was that as i got closer i lost it again and so i felt that it be better if i stated from the beginning until i could zoom in again. all together the viodeos that i took was 30\03\2011 at 7:23:36 pm and 31\03\2011 at 7:19:48 thedirection is due west.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Melbourne

Summary: Fiery Object over Greenvale Victoria Australia
